body:
As midnight comes close and as Santa now makes his way across the world on his sleigh. I hope that everyone who sees this have a great Christmas with their families!

Merry Christmas!

P.S. Shamless guild plug, +Intellectual +CursedComments +RareInsults

title: I Want To Wish All Ruqquteers A Merry Christmas!

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

author.bio: Libertarianish Civic Nationalist that holds free speech and personal accountability as high priorities. I plan to make a Ruqqus fork with political and non-political topics once creation is easier.

body: Merry Christmas, everyone! I'm glad to be a part of this site. I don't agree with everyone, and that's just fine!

Merry Christmas to all, & to all a good Ruqqus.
